title: Ko1
author: Ko1
content: The Poloniex account is mine.Upon successfully depositing, poloniex asked me to do some verification, did everything they asked me to do still no reply from them and I'm in urgent need of money for some businesses.I can provide any proof you need, to proof to you that I'm the original owner of the account.What you will get??1. My ID and support to continue the verification process2. Both the account and email (gmail) password.3. Transactions and history of the funding source.4. Access to the account before buying.Price ~ $1500 ( negotiations available)I accept Escrow too.Accepting btc, PayPal payment.My telegram.   @Marissa006
